name: Dice Guns
description:
Instructions:

Arrow keys to move, Mouse to shoot

HP are in sets of 3 after each wave health will regenerate to the next multiple of 3 if you beat the wave hitless you regenerate 3 health

Collect dice with black pips to upgrade your gun, dice with white pips will downgrade it

Dark blue will change reloading time, light blue will change your movement speed, green will change accuracy, and red will change damage. Hover over the bars on the stats screen to see the exact amount

Dice left on the field will downgrade enemies (regardless of pip color)

Press the dice to start a new wave
